summary: All Round 1 quality issues have been properly fixed. Thread safety implemented correctly with lock and snapshot pattern. Error handling now includes full tracebacks and failure tracking. Code is production-ready.

round_1_fixes_verified.title: Thread Safety in _session_signatures
round_1_fixes_verified.verification: threading.Lock added at line 636, properly used in all access methods with snapshot pattern for reads

round_1_fixes_verified.title: Silent Extraction Failures
round_1_fixes_verified.verification: exc_info=True added for traceback logging, extraction_failed counter tracks and surfaces failures

new_observations.impact: None - property is never called, extract_async uses asyncio.to_thread instead
new_observations.recommendation: Remove dead code in future cleanup, not blocking

next_steps: Optional: Remove dead async_client property in future refactor
Consider adding extraction rate metrics if needed for SLA monitoring
